divs: Sighting DetailsWitnessed 4 different objects, making short quick movements in all directions the first one was red in color and glimmering, would make movments in all directions, noticed multiple aircraft flying in same are, all towards the object and all followed same flight pattern, weird!! Other objects were bright white and blue in color, all makeing the same short movments in all directions. I will include pics. We are still observing these objects as of 11:15 pm, central time
Summary: Witnessed multiple contacts for three hours as of this report, and still observing now
